alert.note: Alert for Emmons; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 11 at 2:28PM CDT until April 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ TUESDAY TO 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central North Dakota. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ Tuesday to 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
